name: Warm Color Palette
description: A color scheme dominated by warm colors such as red, orange, and yellow, often associated with energy and passion.

name: Colorful
description: A broad term used to describe an image that features many different colors, often bright and vibrant.

name: Rainbow
description: A natural spectrum of colors that appears in the sky when the sun shines onto droplets of moisture in the Earth's atmosphere.

name: Spectral Color
description: A color that is part of the visible spectrum of light, as opposed to colors that can only be perceived as a mixture of other colors.

name: Inverted Colors
description: An image in which the colors have been reversed, so that what was once light is now dark and vice versa.

name: Neon
description: A bright, vibrant color scheme that is often associated with the distinctive glow of neon lights.

name: Electric Colors
description: A vivid, bright color scheme that is often associated with electricity and energy.

name: Complimentary-Colors
description: Pairs of colors that are opposite each other on the color wheel, such as red and green, that can create a striking contrast when used together.

name: Dark Mode
description: A color scheme that uses predominantly dark colors for the background and lighter colors for text and other foreground elements.

name: Triadic-Colors
description: A color scheme that uses three colors that are evenly spaced around the color wheel, such as red, blue, and green.

name: Polychromatic Colors
description: A color scheme that uses multiple colors, often with no one color dominating the others.

name: Tones of Black
description: A color scheme that uses various shades and tints of black, from pure black to dark grays and charcoal.

name: Black and White
description: A style of using only black and white colors to create an image.

name: Monochrome
description: A style that uses shades of a single color to create an image.

name: Sepia
description: A style that uses a brownish-grey tint to create a vintage effect.

name: High Contrast
description: A style that emphasizes the difference between light and dark tones in an image.

name: Low Contrast
description: A style that has little difference between light and dark tones in an image.

name: Technicolor
description: A color film process that produced vibrant colors in movies during the mid-20th century.

name: Atari Graphics
description: The visual style of graphics used in Atari video games during the 1970s and 1980s.

name: Adobe RGB
description: A color space used in digital imaging that provides a wider range of colors than sRGB.

name: Hexadecimal
description: A base-16 number system used in computing that is commonly used to represent colors.

name: Vintage
description: A style that imitates the look and feel of old photographs or designs from a previous era.

name: Red
description: A bright and intense color associated with passion, love, and energy.

name: Blue
description: A calm and soothing color associated with stability, trust, and loyalty.

name: Green
description: A fresh and natural color associated with growth, harmony, and health.

name: Yellow
description: A bright and cheerful color associated with happiness, warmth, and optimism.

name: Purple
description: A rich and luxurious color associated with creativity, wisdom, and spirituality.

name: Orange
description: A warm and vibrant color associated with excitement, enthusiasm, and creativity.

name: Pink
description: A sweet and playful color associated with love, romance, and femininity.

name: Brown
description: A natural and earthy color associated with stability, comfort, and warmth.

name: Gray
description: A neutral and sophisticated color associated with balance, calm, and wisdom.

name: Black
description: A powerful and elegant color associated with strength, mystery, and sophistication.

name: Turquoise
description: A refreshing and calming color associated with the ocean and tranquility.

name: Magenta
description: A bold and vibrant color associated with creativity and uniqueness.

name: Teal
description: A cool and refreshing color associated with balance and sophistication.

name: Lavender
description: A gentle and delicate color associated with grace and elegance.

name: Gold
description: A rich and opulent color associated with wealth and prosperity.
